text: Robert "Bob" Maertens (24 January 1930 – 11 January 2003) was a Belgian international footballer who played as a midfielder. ==Career== Born in Boom, Maertens played club football for Royal Antwerp and Olympic de Charleroi- Marchienne. He earned a total of 12 caps for Belgium between 1952 and 1956, and participated at the 1954 FIFA World Cup. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgium international footballers Category:1954 FIFA World Cup players Category:Belgian football managers Category:Royal Antwerp F.C. managers Category:K.R.C.
